channel.title: Graphic Design on Boris Rossovsky
channel.description: Recent content in Graphic Design on Boris Rossovsky

item.title: Vector Recreation: Nintendo Gameboy
item.description: My first try at vector art. Original photo at left, my recreation in the middle.

item.title: Ad: Orbital Ordnance
item.description: Tasked with designing a brand for a mobile app, followed by a long-form image to advertise the app.

item.title: Icons: First Vector Art
item.description: My first venture into iconography. Tasked by “Harold Bezingle” (my college instructor, Neil van der King) to create two sets of icons for two different demographics.
